note.p: Civil engineer. Secretary and general manager of the Maryport & Carlisle Railway Company. Of Castle Hill, Maryport, Cumberland.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/3941/68/36), 1871 (RG10/5246/18/30)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 25 November 2019)
Post Office directory of the county of Durham 1873.
